pages.title: Arbiters Shield
pages.text: This is the Arbiters Shield, once wielded in tangent with the Arbiters Sword by a courageous hero.

The $(i)Arbiters Shield$() can be obtained from a Villager With An $(o)Armorer Profession$() at expert level, however this isn't guaranteed... There is by default a $(0-f)0.4$() out of 1 for it to appear in trades. If you don't like villagers or can't access them, you can also get it at a rare chance from various structures!
